title: Person of Interest S1 E11 - Saving John's life
author: Morgs K
comment: Finch (and the Machine) do their homework. He knew exactly what to bring to motivate that person to do what needed to be done. And in doing so, reestablished that man as a doctor. Good man.
I also love how they don't have to resort to threatening someone, but rather to help them while they are being helped. Tit for tat at its best!
It is hard to believe that Michael Emerson is almost 20 years older than Jim lol
One of the best scenes in S1. How good can this show be? Better than 24, X Files, Star Trek TNG.  Maybe best ever.
This is very moving to me. I love the way they really care about each other, even though they don't show it. This is by far my favorite show!
description:
Original air date 12/01/2012
After being shot by the CIA John is in a bad way. Finch takes him to the city morgue where he knows a good man will save his life.
